description:
The goal of this course is to teach you the common idioms and expressions used in everyday business English in America. In each section you'll hear a conversation between native speakers featuring five new expressions. In the next section, we'll examine each expression and teach you the meaning and how it's used. You'll learn similar (non-idiomatic) expressions, and get practice using these idioms in their place. Finally, in the Fluency Drills, you'll master each idiom by working with it in common constructions.

This free course is only volume #1 out of four volumes. To complete the entire course will approximately one month, but to finish this free Volume #1 will take about one week.
title: Speak Fluent Business English - Volume I
